name: Paul Lastic
description:
You were always the most loved toy in the toybox... but do you have what it takes when you have to face off the army of the skilled soldiers?

You are Paul Lastic: the hip toy from Banana Land Toys, owned by many and adored by a hundred times of that.

That does not mean you're safe, as this fateful day, the luck itself is going to try to defeat you!

Fight off hordes of toy soldiers with nothing but a cursed weapon! Remember - you're being watched by the superiour, who decides your destiny based on your performance. How, you may ask? In the best manner the lady fortuna can! By making it random! HAHAHA!

Controls

WASD to confidently move around
Arrow Keys to crush your enemies to dust

K to spare your enemies and seal your fate

Gameplay

This is a top down hack and slash with the element of randomness. After you kill a number of enemies, your next weapon and its element are decided randomly! For you! You don't even have to choose! Isn't that convenient?

Harness the power of your mighty arsenal!

Sword of the Chance: Hack through your enemies quickly, and efficiently!

Axe of the Luck: Mow down your foes like they're but grass leaves!

Mace of the Fortune: Keep your enemies at the distance to remind themselves who they are!

Use the nature at your disposal to come out victorious!

Wood breaks apart and leaves splinters in your enemies bleeding to death! How do toys bleed? You want them to, so they will.

Rubber is elastic and pushes your enemies even farther away! Not enough to not smell their bad breath, though, so do them justice.

Plastic. Have you noticed how much plastic is there? There's like a ton of plastic around. Which means your weapons are bigger and have more range. Just recycle it properly afterwards.

Credits

BlueMew: Gameplay, Design, Coding, Physics, absolutely making it work

Ratlin Paats: Sound Design, Music, Coding, Physics

YoshiBobby: Art, Designs, Sprites

PutzRitsu: UI Elements, Designs, Sprites
